ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure

Class Boundary

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.process.FloatPolygon
      • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.Boundary

  • public class Boundary
extends ij.process.FloatPolygon
    Describes a compartment boundary (XY trajectory).

    The conversion from [px] to [UNIT] is obtain using WJSettings.getScale() such that 1 [px] = WJSettings.getScale() [UNIT]. The string identifier of [UNIT] is given by WJSettings.getUnit(), for instance "um", "mm", etc.

    Version:
    October 21, 2011
    Author:
    Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com), Ricard Delgado-Gonzalo (ricard.delg...@gmail.com)

      • getSubBoundaryFromCoeff

        public final Boundary getSubBoundaryFromCoeff(double coeff)
        Returns the sub-boundary specified by the coefficient [0.,1.] of the actual boundary length.

        For instance, Boundary.getSubBoundaryFromCoeff(0.6) returns 60% of the original boundary.

      • getSubBoundary

        public final Boundary getSubBoundary(double length)
        Returns the sub-boundary specified by the given length in [UNIT].
